titleStmt.title: The conversion, confession, contrition, comming to himselfe, & advice, of a mis-led, ill-bred, rebellious round-head which is very fitting to be read to such as weare short haire, and long eares, or desire eares long / written by John Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

titleStmt.title: The conversion, confession, contrition, comming to himselfe, & advice, of a mis-led, ill-bred, rebellious round-head which is very fitting to be read to such as weare short haire, and long eares, or desire eares long / written by John Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: A pretend biography of a perverted weaver.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
